paragraphs: The Tales of Tribute Intermediate Tournament is about to begin! The following names and locations will be awaiting the challenge of Roister's Club members hoping to advance in rank.
The Roister's Club, in the city of Skywatch, in Auridon
The Roister's Club, in the city of Marbruk, in Greenshade
The Roister's Club, in the city of Elden Root, in Grahtwood
